# Government Schemes APIs (data.gov.in)

## Scope
This list is derived from data.gov.in API resources where the resource title contains one of the following terms: `scheme`, `schemes`, `yojana`.

## Sources
- data.gov.in API directory (API resources)

## Access Requirements
Data access requires a data.gov.in API key. Use the standard resource endpoint:
- https://api.data.gov.in/resource/{resource_id}?api-key=YOUR_API_KEY&format=json
